name: 数据库校验-交易平仓-主指令及订单详情数据检查-没有订单
description:
### 测试说明
    - 前置条件：有vps策略和vps跟单
      1. 修改跟单账号，跟单方向-正向
      2. 进行开仓
      3. 交易下单-跟单账号自己平仓-sell
      4. 校验平仓的订单数，应该不等于4
      5. 交易下单-跟单账号自己平仓-buy
      6. 校验平仓的订单数,等于4
    - 预期结果：平仓的订单方向功能正确
descriptionHtml:
### 测试说明
- 前置条件：有vps策略和vps跟单
  1. 修改跟单账号，跟单方向-正向
  2. 进行开仓
  3. 交易下单-跟单账号自己平仓-sell
  4. 校验平仓的订单数，应该不等于4
  5. 交易下单-跟单账号自己平仓-buy
  6. 校验平仓的订单数,等于4
- 预期结果：平仓的订单方向功能正确
statusTrace:
self = <lingkuan_820.test_vps.test_vps_masOrderClose.TestVPSMasOrderclose.TestVPStradingOrders5 object at 0x0000014712E7F460>
var_manager = <lingkuan_820.commons.variable_manager.VariableManager object at 0x0000014712FE88B0>
db_transaction = <pymysql.connections.Connection object at 0x00000147130BF190>

    @allure.title("数据库校验-交易平仓-主指令及订单详情数据检查-没有订单")
    def test_dbquery_orderSendclose(self, var_manager, db_transaction):
        with allure.step("1. 获取订单详情界面跟单账号数据"):
            new_user = var_manager.get_variable("new_user")
            sql = f"""
                    SELECT
                         fod.size,
                         fod.close_no,
                         fod.magical,
                         fod.open_price,
                         fod.symbol,
                         fod.order_no,
                         fod.close_time,
                         foi.true_total_lots,
                         foi.order_no,
                         foi.operation_type,
                         foi.create_time,
                         foi.status,
                         foi.min_lot_size,
                         foi.max_lot_size,
                         foi.total_lots,
                         foi.master_order,
                         foi.total_orders
                    FROM
                        follow_order_detail fod
                    INNER JOIN
                        follow_order_instruct foi
                    ON
                        foi.order_no = fod.close_no COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
                    WHERE foi.operation_type = %s
                        AND fod.account = %s
                        """
            params = (
                '1',
                new_user["account"],
            )
    
            # 调用轮询等待方法（带时间范围过滤）
            db_data = self.wait_for_database_no_record(
                db_transaction=db_transaction,
                sql=sql,
                params=params,
                time_field="foi.create_time"
            )
        with allure.step("2. 数据校验"):
>           assert len(db_data) == 0, f"平仓失败，应该没有平仓订单，结果有{len(db_data)}个订单"
E           AssertionError: 平仓失败，应该没有平仓订单，结果有4个订单
E           assert 4 == 0
E            +  where 4 = len([{'close_no': '4690262584541', 'close_time': '2025-08-25 11:51:29', 'create_time': '2025-08-25 16:51:29', 'foi.order_no': '4690262584541', ...}, {'close_no': '4690262584541', 'close_time': '2025-08-25 11:51:29', 'create_time': '2025-08-25 16:51:29', 'foi.order_no': '4690262584541', ...}, {'close_no': '4690262584541', 'close_time': '2025-08-25 11:51:29', 'create_time': '2025-08-25 16:51:29', 'foi.order_no': '4690262584541', ...}, {'close_no': '4690262584541', 'close_time': '2025-08-25 11:51:29', 'create_time': '2025-08-25 16:51:29', 'foi.order_no': '4690262584541', ...}])

test_vps\test_vps_masOrderClose.py:1482: AssertionError

    @allure.title("数据库校验-交易平仓-主指令及订单详情数据检查-没有订单")
    def test_dbquery_orderSendclose(self, var_manager, db_transaction):
        with allure.step("1. 获取订单详情界面跟单账号数据"):

                         fod.size,

                         fod.symbol,

                         fod.close_time,

                         foi.total_lots,
                         foi.master_order,
                         foi.total_orders

                        follow_order_detail fod

        with allure.step("2. 数据校验"):
